author: Staff Reporter
text:
Y’s Men’s Club Coimbatore and Coimbatore Institute of Technology are jointly organising a mini marathon from the institution premises on February 21, to create an awareness on blood donation.

The organisers said that a directory of blood donors would be created. Participants should be not less than 18-years-old. For registration, call 98430-72276 or 74020-47200 between 8 a.m. and 8 p.m. or long on to www.ysmenblooddonors.org.

The participants have to cover 8 km. The mini marathon will begin at 6 a.m.
title: Mini marathon on Sunday
